select.isNotEmpty:
SELECT PA.ID AS id, PA.FDRID AS fdrid, PA.NAME as name, DOCID, CRTNDATE as crtndate, PA.LOC as loc, FILEID as fileId, FILESIZE as fileSize, PR.PAGEID as pageId, SA.COMMENTS as comments, SA.MIME_TYPE as mimeType, SA.VALIDITY_TYPE as validityType, SA.DOCUMENT_TYPE as documentType, SA2.PAGEID AS pageSignedId, PR.FLAG as flag, SAS.HASH AS hash, SAS.HASH_ALG AS hashAlg FROM $tableName$ PA INNER JOIN IVOLFILEHDR IV ON FILEID = IV.ID AND IV.EXTID1 = $idBook$ AND IV.EXTID2= PA.FDRID AND IV.EXTID3= PA.DOCID INNER JOIN SCR_PAGEREPOSITORY PR ON IV.ID = PR.DOCUID AND PR.DELETEDATE IS NULL
AND PR.FLAG IS NULL
LEFT JOIN SCR_PAGEINFO PI ON PR.BOOKID = PI.BOOKID AND PR.FDRID = PI.REGID AND PR.PAGEID = PI.PAGEID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT SA ON SA.BOOKID = PR.BOOKID AND SA.FOLDERID = PR.FDRID AND SA.PAGEID = PR.PAGEID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT_SIGN_INFO SAS ON SAS.ID_ATTACHMENT = SA.ID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT SA2 ON SA2.ID = SAS.ID_ATTACHMENT_SIGNED WHERE PA.ID = #id# AND PA.FDRID= #fdrid# ORDER BY CRTNDATE

AND PR.FLAG IS NULL
LEFT JOIN SCR_PAGEINFO PI ON PR.BOOKID = PI.BOOKID AND PR.FDRID = PI.REGID AND PR.PAGEID = PI.PAGEID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT SA ON SA.BOOKID = PR.BOOKID AND SA.FOLDERID = PR.FDRID AND SA.PAGEID = PR.PAGEID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT_SIGN_INFO SAS ON SAS.ID_ATTACHMENT = SA.ID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT SA2 ON SA2.ID = SAS.ID_ATTACHMENT_SIGNED WHERE PA.DOCID = #docid# AND PA.FDRID= #fdrid#
